content:
I think there might be some confusion! As a digital AI assistant, I don't have personal experiences or physically travel. I exist solely to provide information and assist with inquiries. I'm happy to help you plan your trip and provide recommendations, but I won't be joining you on your adventures.

However, I'm thrilled to hear that you had a great experience during your solo trip to Japan last year! It's wonderful that you're planning another trip and looking to explore more of what Japan has to offer.
